# 1.3.2 Analysis questions


1. Which bird had the most individual sightings?

```{r}
bird_ship %>%
  group_by(species_common_name) %>%
  filter(bird_count == 1) %>%
  summarise(total_count = sum(bird_count)) %>%
  slice_max(total_count, n = 1)

```


2. Which bird had the highest total count?

